Title: Relates to requiring certain public schools to offer Halal food options and Kosher food options during lunch
Summary: Requires public schools that have 500 or more students practicing Halal and/or Kosher to offer Halal food options and/or Kosher food options during lunch.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring certain public schools to offer Halal food options and Kosher food options during lunch
